intro: Miconia incerta, commonly known as the uncertain miconia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its large, palmate leaves and showy, pinkish-white flowers that bloom in clusters. It is often found in moist, shaded areas within tropical forests. Due to its rapid growth and invasive potential, it can pose a threat to native ecosystems in certain regions.
